#include<stdio.h>
#include<stdlib.h>


int main()
{
int nT;
scanf("%d",&nT);
while(nT--)
{
  long int a,b;
  scanf("%ld %ld",&a,&b);
  int c = a%10;
  int res;
  switch(c)
  {
     case 0:
       res =0;
      // printf("%d\n",c);
       break;
     case 1:
       res = 1;
       break;
     case 5:
       res = 5;
       break;
     case 6:
       res = 6;
       break;
     case 2:
     {
        int d = b%4;
        if(d==1)
         res = 2;
        else if(d == 2)
         res = 4;
        else if(d ==3)
         res = 8;
        else if(d == 0)
          res = 6;
      }
    break;
    case 3:
    {
     int d = b%4;
        if(d==1)
         res = 3;
        else if(d == 2)
         res = 9;
        else if(d ==3)
         res = 7;
        else if(d == 0)
          res = 1;

    }
    break;
case 4:
    {
     int d = b%2;
        if(d==1)
         res = 4;
        else if(d == 0)
         res = 6;
       

    }
    break;
case 7:
    {
     int d = b%4;
        if(d==1)
         res = 7;
        else if(d == 2)
         res = 9;
        else if(d ==3)
         res = 3;
        else if(d == 0)
          res = 1;

    }
    break;
case 8:
    {
     int d = b%4;
        if(d==1)
         res = 8;
        else if(d == 2)
         res = 4;
        else if(d ==3)
         res = 2;
        else if(d == 0)
          res = 6;

    }
    break;
case 9:
    {
     int d = b%2;
        if(d==1)
         res = 9;
        else if(d == 0)
          res = 1;

    }
    break;
}
   
  printf("%d\n",res);
  

}
 

return 0;
}
